        apartmentOwnerID This is the id of the newly created apartment owner entity.

      • getBuildingForApartmentOwner

        public static Building getBuildingForApartmentOwner(ApartmentOwner aptOwner)
        Method to get the BUILDING of an APARTMENT OWNER Note: The method uses raw sql query, since the requested object is mapped in non traditional way. HQL query was not possible, so the solution was to use SQL.
        Parameters:
        aptOwner - This is an ApartmentOwner object passed to complete the query.
        Returns:
        building This is the Building object that corresponds to the passed apartment owner
